name: Lifelust
description:
Lifelust is a game where you collect souls and sell them in exchange for powerups.

Planned Features:

  • New enemies: Werewolf
  • Story Mode

Controls:

  • WASD / ←↑→↓   =   Move / Select
  • Space / X   =  Action
  • Esc  / P =  Pause

Credits:

  • Programming - Hugonun
  • Art & Design - Mateusboga
  • Music & Sound Design - Kamaraum
